title: Lingle man accused of shooting, killing baby, dies
content:
Duane Clarkson Sylvester, 53, of Lingle, Wyoming, had been hospitalized at Regional West Medical Center after he shot himself on Thursday night. Goshen County Sheriff's Lt. Jeremy Wardell said Monday that Sylvester died Friday.
Sylvester had been accused of shooting and killing his 4-month-old baby during a domestic disturbance. Deputies were called to a report of a domestic disturbance and suicidal male at a residence at 8232 Cemetery Road in Lingle at about 11:56 p.m. A woman, identified as Jessica Lynn Fritzler, 33, told dispatchers that her husband had shot her baby and then himself.
The baby died at the scene of injuries suffered, Wardell said.
Sylvester was flown by Air Link to Regional West Medical Center. Wardell said no further information is being released.
